#summary A bullet point road map for gwt-comet
  * subdomain support
  * Async IO
    * [http://jcp.org/en/jsr/detail?id=315 JSR 315: Java Servlet 3.0 Specification]
    * [http://docs.sun.com/app/docs/doc/820-4496/ghgxk?a=view Grizzly Comet]
    * [http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/aio.html Apache Tomcat 6.0 - Advanced IO and Tomcat]
  * overlapping requests to mask connection refresh establishment latency
  * JMS integration
  * support for sharing a comet connection across multiple browser windows/tabs
